motto: Ua mau ke ea o ka 'āina i ka pono
english: The life of the land is perpetuated in righteousness

motto: Our liberties we prize and our rights we will maintain
english: Our liberties we prize and our rights we will maintain

motto: United we stand, divided we fall
english: United we stand, divided we fall

motto: Ense petit placidam sub libertate quietem
english: By the sword we seek peace, but peace only under liberty
If you seek a pleasant peninsula, look about you
Let the welfare of the people be the supreme law
To be, rather than to seem

motto: Liberty and union, now and forever, one and inseparable
english: Liberty and union, now and forever, one and inseparable

motto: With God, all things are possible
english: With God, all things are possible
She flies with her own wings
